duck: Degeneration X (also spelled D-Generation X and often abbreviated DX or D-X) was a professional wrestling tag team in WWE
Devolution (biology) - In common parlance, "devolution", "de-evolution", or backward evolution is the notion that a species can change into a more "primitive" form.

wiki.text:
{{multiple issues|


}}

The idea of 'degeneration' goes back to the 18th century, and had significant
influence on science, art and politics from the 1850s to the 1950s. The social
theory developed consequently from Charles Darwin's Theory of Evolution.
Evolution meant that mankind's development was no longer fixed and certain, but
could change and evolve or degenerate into an unknown future, possibly a bleak
future that clashes with the analogy between evolution and civilization as a
progressive positive direction.

As a consequence, theorists assumed the human species might be overtaken by a
more adaptable species or circumstances might change and suit a more adapted
species. Degeneration theory presented a pessimistic outlook for the future of
western civilization as it believed the progress of the 19th century had begun
to work against itself.
wiki.title: degeneration
